description: The file defines the 'BudgetsScreen' widget and its associated internal '_BudgetsScreenState' class, which display a list of budget categories, allow fetching budgets from a provider, and facilitate adding new budgets through a modal form. It also includes the '_BudgetForm' widget for creating new budgets.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays the list of budgets and manages their fetching and display.

classes.name: _BudgetsScreenState
classes.description: State class for BudgetsScreen, managing data fetching, UI interactions, and rendering the list or empty state.

classes.name: _BudgetForm
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a form to create a new budget.

classes.name: _BudgetFormState
classes.description: State class for _BudgetForm, handling form validation, submission, and interaction with the provider.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and triggers initial fetch of budgets.

methods.name: _openAddBudgetForm
methods.description: Opens a modal bottom sheet with the form to add a new budget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main screen UI, showing loading, list of budgets, or empty state accordingly.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating a new budget, interacts with provider, and shows feedback.
